abstract:
This is an extract from Robert W. Bennett's Originalism and The Living American Constitution, in Robert W. Bennett & Lawrence Solum, Constitutional Originalism: A Debate 185 n.35 (2011), citing Tillman's A Textualist Defense.
[June 10, 2011]
title: Extract from Robert W. Bennett's Originalism and The Living American Constitution, in Robert W. Bennett & Lawrence Solum, Constitutional Originalism: A Debate (2011), citing Tillman's A Textualist Defense
subject: law
